publicationstmt.publisher: M. E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives
publicationstmt.date: Copyright 2015 By the University at Albany, SUNY. All rights reserved.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: The collection consists of inactive records from the University at Albany's Office of Accounting.
did.physloc: The materials are located onsite in the department.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: M. E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University at Albany, SUNY

bioghist.head: Biographical History
bioghist.p: The University at Albany's Office of Accounting establishes policies and procedures associated with the University's fiscal transactions.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collections consists of memoranda on accounting practices, 1970-83, the Office of Sponsored Funds, 1975-82, progress reports on Sponsored Funds, 1967-69, and a chart of accounts, 1971-80.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of the Collection
arrangement.p: The collection is unprocessed and is likely disorganized. Individual items may be difficult to find.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: All items in this manuscript group were transferred to the University Libraries, M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted because it is unprocessed. Portions of the collection may contain recent administrative records and/or personally identifiable information. While it is likely that portions of the collection may be viewed, access must be managed by an archivist.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The researcher assumes full responsibility for conforming with the laws of copyright. Whenever possible, the M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives will provide information about copyright owners and other restrictions, but the legal determination ultimately rests with the researcher. Requests for permission to publish material from this collection should be discussed with the Head of Special Collections and Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:

Identification of specific item, series, box, folder, Office of Accounting Records. M.E. Grenander Department of Special Collections and Archives, University Libraries, University at Albany, State University of New York.

controlaccess.head: Subject and Genre Headings
controlaccess.corpname: State University of New York at Albany-Office of Accounting
controlaccess.subject: State University of New York at Albany-Administration

acqinfo.p: Web crawling is managed through the Internet Archive's Archive-It service. This page includes links to both the university's collection and the Internet Archive's public collection.

Surface-level crawling of www.albany.edu is performed daily which should includes most top-level webpages. Separate targeted crawls of every albany.edu subdomain are performed monthly to attempt to gather all content. This includes: www.albany.edu, www.rna.albany.edu, www.ctg.albany.edu, www.ualbanysports.com, www.albany.edu/rockefeller, www.albany.edu/cela, www.albany.edu/asrc, m.albany.edu, library.albany.edu, events.albany.edu, cstar.cestm.albany.edu, csda.albany.edu, and alumni.albany.edu

did.unittitle: WARC file for http://www.albany.edu/accounting/, (please see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web_ARChive for more details)

accessrestrict.p: WARC files are very large and difficult to work with. Your request may take time to process, and we may be unable to deliver your request remotely. Please consult an archivist if you are interested in researching with web archives.
